directions: Mix brown sugar, butter or margarine, and water.  Add flour, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt.  Stir in nuts and mix well.
Shape in roll 2 1/2 inches in diameter, cover and chill until firm.
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Cut dough into 1/8-1/4  inch slices. Bake on greased cookie sheet  8-10 minutes.
title: Northland Cookies
